description: M i s c e l l a n y   ( D a v i d   b e n   J o s h u a   b e n   A b r a h a m   M a i m o n i d e s ' s   c o m m e n t a r y   o n   M a i m o n i d e s ' s   M i s h n e h   T o r a h   ( S e f e r   h a - z e m a n i m :   H i l k h o t   ḳ i d u s h   h a - ḥ o d e s h ) ;   c o m m e n t a r y   o n   t h e   S e f e r   y e t s i r a h ,   a t t r i b u t e d   t o   A b r a h a m   b e n   D a v i d   o f   P o s q u i e ̀ r e s )
title: Miscellany (David ben Joshua ben Abraham Maimonides's commentary on Maimonides's Mishneh Torah (Sefer ha-zemanim: Hilkhot ḳidush ha-ḥodesh); commentary on the Sefer yetsirah, attributed to Abraham ben David of Posquières)
